fullContent: Homeâ€º GirlBFFs Black Friday CollectionBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenHey girls! The Christmas season has begun already! And we're excited about Black Friday shopping, aren't we? Bustling malls, massive deals, shoppers zigzag with the energy, and the air buzzes with the sound of laughter and "did you see this?" Families wheel out carts piled high with bargains, and friends take selfies with giant store decorations. We took this festive frenzy to the virtual world and added the magic of dress-up games!BFFs Black Friday Collection is a fun fashion game where you help six stylish girls prepare for a day of Black Friday shopping. Each girl has her own unique style and personality, so it's up to you to create the perfect outfit and makeup look for each of them.
